name: Savings Account
description: A fundamental account for individuals to save money and earn interest. It's ideal for long-term financial goals and emergency funds, providing a secure and accessible way to grow your savings.
benefits: Easy access to funds when needed
Tools to help you save consistently

name: Current Account
description: Designed for businesses and individuals with high transaction volumes, offering unlimited transactions and no interest on deposits, making it perfect for daily operational needs.
benefits: Access to credit facilities for business growth
eligibility: Businesses: Business registration documents, proof of address
Individuals: Minimum age 18 years, valid identification, proof of address

name: Student Account
description: Tailored for students, often with no monthly fees, special discounts, and features to help manage finances during their studies, easing the financial burden of education.
benefits: Helps build good money habits early
Easy access to funds for student needs
eligibility: Enrolled in an accredited educational institution
Minimum age 18 years (or parental consent for minors)

name: Joint Account
description: An account shared by two or more individuals, perfect for couples, families, or roommates to manage shared expenses and finances collaboratively and transparently.
features: Shared access and management by all account holders
Separate debit cards for each holder
benefits: Convenient for household bills and expenses
eligibility: All account holders must be 18 years or older
Valid identification and proof of address for all applicants

name: Fixed Deposit (FD)
description: A type of investment account where a fixed sum of money is deposited for a specific period at a fixed interest rate, offering higher returns than savings accounts and a secure investment option.
features: Higher interest rates compared to savings accounts
Option for interest payout (monthly, quarterly, annually, or at maturity)
eligibility: Individuals, HUFs, NRIs, companies, and trusts can open an FD
Valid identification and proof of address

name: Recurring Deposit (RD)
description: An investment scheme allowing individuals to deposit a fixed amount of money every month for a fixed tenure, earning interest on their savings and building a disciplined savings habit.
features: Higher interest rates than savings accounts
Suitable for achieving short to medium-term goals
eligibility: Individuals, minors (through guardian), HUFs, companies, and trusts
Valid identification and proof of address

name: Goal-Based Savings Account
description: An account that helps users save for specific financial goals by allowing them to create separate 'pots' or 'buckets' for each objective, making savings more tangible and motivating.
features: Set multiple savings goals (e.g., vacation, down payment, education)
Track progress for each goal individually
Option to invite collaborators for shared goals
benefits: Clear path to achieving financial goals
Flexibility to adjust goals as needed
